meaning_str.bing:
n. 牛肉；抱怨；牢骚
adj. 供食用的；牛类的
v. 老是抱怨；大发牢骚
网络. 牛肉类；菜牛；逼丈夫吃牛肉

牛肉类；菜牛；逼丈夫吃牛肉

牛肉；<非正式>牢骚；怨言；抱怨；问题；争端；不满；争论；争论点；实质性内容；重点
<非正式>发牢骚；抱怨；诉苦；表达不满；提出意见；申诉；告发

1.en: The UK supermarkets said the beef did not come from the Amazon.
1.cn: 英国的一些超级市场表示，它们购进的牛肉并非来自亚马逊。

2.en: Kimchi soup out of a lot of meat, miso soup and beef soup than the cost, the confidence just bought the wrong wrong it did not sell.
2.cn: 泡菜汤外面有很多肉，比大酱汤和牛肉汤划算，置信只要买错没有卖错的吧。

3.en: Technician Andreas Hlinak says it is too soon to know how much horse meat exists in beef sold in Germany.
3.cn: 技术员安德烈亚斯·海纳克表示现在就想了解德国销售的牛肉中存在多少马肉还为时过早。

0.en: Oh, beef, I'm going to miss you so much.

1.en: OK, so mushrooms out, and onto the beef, like that.
1.cn: 好了，将蘑菇放在牛肉上，就像这样。

2.en: Here's two dollars. Go buy some beef jerky. I don't want beef jerky.
2.cn: 给你两块钱，去买点牛肉干。我不想吃牛肉干。

3.en: Now to cook the marinated beef. Wok on, oil in. Wok is ready. It's smoking. In with the beef.
3.cn: 现在炒腌好的牛肉。放上锅，倒些油，锅热了，冒烟了，放入牛肉。

4.en: Now, when you put the beef in, just make sure it has time to just settle a little bit before you start to stir.
4.cn: 放入牛肉后，要保证牛肉在锅底煎一小会，然后再开始翻炒。

5.en: So that's the beef done. Out on top of the spinach, like so.
5.cn: 牛肉做好了，盛在菠菜上，就像这样。

6.en: Now the beef is done. I'm going to put it to one side, let it rest.
6.cn: 现在牛肉做好了，我把它放在一边，静置一会。

7.en: I just ordered a case of Dinty Moore beef stew and two live lobsters on Amazon.
7.cn: 我刚在亚马逊上订了一箱炖牛肉罐头和两只活龙虾。

8.en: So there's my version of beef in oyster sauce, essentially, three stir-frys in one dish.
8.cn: 这就是我做的蚝油牛肉，其实就是三菜合一。

9.en: If there's a single food that symbolizes the American diet for me, it's beef.
9.cn: 如果有一种食物能作为美国食品的标志，非牛肉莫属。

10.en: In with the beef and let that sizzle. Brown it on one side and then brown the other side.
10.cn: 放入牛肉，就会发出滋滋声。分别将两面煎成棕色。

11.en: What did they give you? Turkey and roast beef with Swiss and lettuce on whole wheat.
11.cn: 那他们给你的什么？火鸡和烤牛肉全麦上放的芝士和生菜。

12.en: Gorgeous bit of the beef there. Some of these delicious smoky mushrooms. Bit of salad.
12.cn: 先是香喷喷的牛肉，然后加入热气腾腾的蘑菇，配一些莴苣。

13.en: This vast quantity of corn makes it possible to produce beef on an industrial scale.
13.cn: 巨量的玉米让这一切成为可能，让我们能够以工业级的规模生产牛肉。

14.en: Sue's given us a list of hot pot ingredients to find in the market, lotus root, mushrooms and beef.
14.cn: 苏给了我们一张火锅料单到市场入货，莲藕，蘑菇还有牛肉。

15.en: The beef? Yeah, that was weird to me, too. But then, you know, I thought "well, there's mincemeat pie."
15.cn: 炒牛肉吗？我也觉得有点奇怪，不过我想连甜肉馅饼都有了。

16.en: What you got over there? Tacos? No. No. They're just ground beef smileys. Those are tacos.
16.cn: 那是什么？墨西哥卷饼吗？不，它们只是牛肉包大饼。那是墨西哥卷饼。

17.en: Before the beef comes out, I'm going to add a pinch or two of dried chilli flakes, and these give a gorgeous kick.
17.cn: 在牛肉出锅前，挑一点干辣椒末放进去，使肉鲜香中带些麻辣。

18.en: I've always been a little confused about this. Why don't hindus eat beef? We believe cows are gods.
18.cn: 我一直对这事儿有些疑惑，为什么印度教不准吃牛肉？我们相信牛就是神。

19.en: So, I'm going to show you one of my favorites, Sichuan orange beef, and it's really authentic in flavor.
19.cn: 所以，我要来展示一下我最拿手的四川香橙牛肉，这真的是地道的川味。
